Reviews.Title: Bought as a Gift
Reviews.Author: does it suck or not
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my niece. She absolutely loved it. Works great would definitely purchase another one if I needed to.

Reviews.Title: Works great on pay as you go
Reviews.Author: MommaJ
Reviews.Content: Great intro smart phone!  I don't need a whole lot of bells and whistles, my phone plan is with iwireless megatalk, and the data I have access to is limited.  I just want to be able to look up an address in a pinch or do a quick Google search.  This phone is great for that, it has access to my wireless internet here at the house, too, and if I want a faster, more in depth search, I just hook it up to my home internet.  So even if you don't have a data plan, you can work off of wifi.  There are a few apps like Google Maps and Play, and if you want more you need to get an SD card for more memory; you also need one if you want to take photos or video, so I bought Kingston Digital 16 GB Class 4 microSDHC Flash Card with SD Adapter (SDC4/16GBET). The camera is only rear, so you cannot Skype. The pictures aren't fantastic, it needs a LOT of light.Navigation is pretty easy, I like the swipe down menu, it allows you to quickly turn your data, Bluetooth and/or wireless on and off quickly.  Apps are easy to delete and organize, settings are easy to find and change.It did come fully unlocked, my calls and texts come through flawlessly, and I could still get data on my network(iwireless is connected to TMobile).  It's a nice light weight and the touch screen has good sensitivity, I can use my finger or stylus fine.  Has the standard calendar, calculator, alarm and fm radio. It also came with a charger, headset, and even a screen protector which was an added bonus.  It connected to my D3588-2 DECT 6.0 Expandable Corded/Cordless Phone with Answering System and Bluetooth CELLLiNK, Silver, 2 Handsets and 1 Base through Bluetooth with no problems at all, and all my calls are clear, handset, Bluetooth and speaker phone.May not be the latest and greatest, and the average techie may not think it's wonderful, but for the price, this is a great smartphone.  I would recommend this to anyone who might be contemplating the upgrade, it's cheap, and you don't have to sign a contract.  I haven't found any problems yet, but I will definitely update this review if any are found.

Reviews.Title: Nice sleek look but looks can only get you so far. Very bad quality!
Reviews.Author: jrsygirl
Reviews.Content: This phone is going back. On every call I am on I have to repeat myself. Horrible quality!I guess I got what I paid for. Do yourself a favor and invest a little more money for better quality.I learned my lesson this time.

Reviews.Title: Cheap quality phone
Reviews.Author: t dawg
Reviews.Content: The phone is very cheaply made with poor quality of almost everything. Constantly dropping calls and not even allowing me to answer when people called me. I emailed person who sold this product and they were nice in helping me get internet working but couldn't figure out why I couldn't send or receive picture messages. They are going to give me a refund for this which is nice. I don't recommend this phone at all. Pictures I took on it look fake and like I didn't even take them. Guess you get what you pay for

Reviews.Title: basic
Reviews.Author: rossy
Reviews.Content: I like a basic computer and enjoyable qualities only thing is that it has little internal memory and fewer permissions

Reviews.Title: Not Bad
Reviews.Author: Ronny Contreras
Reviews.Content: I'm Satisfied with the product because for my little Child its a perfect device and he is very happy with his phone

Reviews.Title: Pick Something Else
Reviews.Author: A.A
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for my mom and I have heard nothing but complaints from her. Doesn't keep any history of calls in her call log, drops calls , and freezes up. she hates it.

Reviews.Title: Can't download apps
Reviews.Author: Elhadj
Reviews.Content: Bought 4 of these phones but could not download apps. The customer service confirmed that you can only download 1 app. Had to return them all.

Reviews.Title: not too good
Reviews.Author: karis pesola
Reviews.Content: it wasn't durable at all. the only good part was the sound was great but the phone fell two feet and completely broke and fell apart

Reviews.Title: Phone is too week
Reviews.Author: cer
Reviews.Content: This phone is not a finished product as its looks may say. The phone is week, breaks easily, and service is not that great either. I do not recommend it.
